original: atha khalu bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ bhagavantaṃ mahāvajrasattvaṃ stuvanti sma-
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavantaḥ sarva tathāgatāḥ bhagavantam mahā vajra sattvam stuvanti sma
moha vajra svabhāvaḥ tvam yamāriḥ ati bhīṣaṇaḥ
sarva buddha mayaḥ śāntaḥ kāya vajra namaḥ astu te  /
piśuna vajra svabhāvaḥ tvam yamāriḥ ati bhīṣaṇaḥ
citta vajra pratīkāśaḥ ratna vajra namaḥ astu te
rāga vajra svabhāvaḥ tvam yamāriḥ ati bhīṣaṇaḥ
sarva ghoṣa vara agra agrya vāc vajra namaḥ astu te
īrṣyā vajra svabhāvaḥ tvam yamāri rati bhīṣaṇaḥ
kāya vajra pratīkāśa saṅga pāṇe namaḥ astu te  /
sarva buddha svabhāvaḥ tvam sarva buddha eka saṃgrahaḥ
sarva buddha vara agra agrya maṇḍala īśa namaḥ astu te
